text.textblock: Farm Credit Administration Board; Regular Meeting.

summary.textblock: Notice is hereby given, pursuant to the Government in the Sunshine Act (5 U.S.C. 552b(e)(3)), of the forthcoming regular meeting of the Farm Credit Administration Board (Board).

date.textblock: The regular meeting of the Board will be held at the offices of the Farm Credit Administration in McLean, Virginia, on January 13, 1994, from 9:45 a.m. until such time as the Board concludes its business.

further.textblock: Curtis M. Anderson, Secretary to the Farm Credit Administration Board, (703) 883-4003, TDD (703) 883-4444.

address.textblock: Farm Credit Administration, 1501 Farm Credit Drive, McLean, Virginia 22102-5090.

supplem.textblock: Parts of this meeting of the Board will be open to the public (limited space available), and parts of this meeting will be closed to the public. The matters to be considered at the meeting are:
a. Funding and Fiscal Affairs, Loan Policies and Operations, and Funding Operations (Final).
a. Review of FCA Policy Statements.

footnote.textblock: Session closed to the public_exempt pursuant to 5 U.S.C. 552b(c)(8), (9) and (10).

signjob.textblock: Acting Secretary, Farm Credit Administration Board.
